data.title: Who is Courteney Cox Married to? Who is Courtney Cox Dating?
meta_keywords: who is courteney cox married to?who is courtney cox dating?
data.meta_description: Courteney Cox was previously married to David Arquette, with whom she shares a daughter. She is currently dating Johnny McDaid, a musician from Snow Patrol.
data.text:
Who is Courteney Cox Married to?

Courteney Cox, famous for her role on "Friends," was previously married to David Arquette. They were married on June 12, 1999, at Grace Cathedral in San Francisco. They have a daughter, born in June 2004, and Jennifer Aniston, Courteney’s "Friends" co-star, is the godmother of their child. Before her marriage to David Arquette, Courteney Cox was in a relationship with actor Michael Keaton, which lasted from 1989 to 1995. In October 2010, Courteney and David Arquette announced their separation, although they continued to be friends and worked together in their company, Coquette Productions.

David Arquette filed for divorce from Courteney Cox in June 2012, and the legal dissolution of their marriage was completed in May 2013. Subsequently, in late 2013, Courteney Cox entered into a relationship with Johnny McDaid, a musician from the band Snow Patrol. The couple announced their engagement in June 2014; however, they later decided to call off the engagement. Despite this, they have stayed together as a couple. Courteney has also shared that she sometimes binge-watches "Friends" because she doesn’t remember much about the episodes. She practices Budokan karate in her free time.

TRENDING

Who is Courtney Cox Dating?

Courteney Cox is dating Johnny McDaid, a musician from the band Snow Patrol. They first met at a party in 2013, and despite some ups and downs—including a brief split and long-distance challenges—they remain deeply committed to each other.

Cox and McDaid are not officially married, but Cox has said she feels "married in her heart" to him. They have celebrated many milestones together, including anniversaries and special events. Although they haven’t married, Cox has expressed that she feels "married in her heart" to McDaid. They often share their affection publicly and seem very happy together.

Who is Courteney Cox?

Courteney Bass Cox, born on June 15, 1964, is an American actress and filmmaker. She is famous for portraying Monica Geller on Friends (1994–2004) and Gale Weathers in the Scream films (1996–present). Her accolades include a Screen Actors Guild Award and nominations for two Emmy Awards and a Golden Globe.

Cox's other TV roles include Family Ties, Dirt, Cougar Town, and Shining Vale. In films, she appeared in Masters of the Universe, Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, and Barnyard. Courteney Cox runs Coquette Productions. She directed TalhotBlond (2012) and Just Before I Go (2014) and also produced the show Celebrity Name Game.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5T6Vkzv3QV/

Courteney Cox Early Life

Courteney Cox was born and grew up in Birmingham, Alabama. Her parents are Richard Lewis Cox (1931-2001) and Courteney Copeland (née Bass) (1934-2020). Courteney Cox has two older sisters, Virginia and Dorothy, and an older brother, Richard Jr. After her parents divorced in 1974, her mother married Hunter Copeland, who is connected to music promoter Ian Copeland and The Police drummer Stewart Copeland.

Cox graduated from Mountain Brook High School and started college at Mount Vernon College in Washington, D.C. She switched from studying architecture to modeling and acting. She also learned she is related to English royalty.

Courteney Cox Career

Courteney Cox started her career in the 1980s, first working at Bethesda Softworks and featuring in Bruce Springsteen's "Dancing in the Dark" music video. Her early TV appearances included roles on various shows like Misfits of Science and Family Ties, and film roles in Masters of the Universe and Cocoon: The Return. In the 1990s, she gained fame as Monica Geller on Friends and played Gale Weathers in the Scream horror films.

In the 2000s, Cox starred in Dirt and Cougar Town and made her directorial debut with TalhotBlond. She also produced and appeared in Celebrity Name Game. In recent years, Cox returned to Scream for the fifth and sixth films, starred in the Starz series Shining Vale and received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2023.

Who is Johnny McDaid?

John McDaid, born on July 24, 1976, is a musician from Northern Ireland. He is best known as a member of the band Snow Patrol, where he plays guitar and contributes to the band's music. McDaid is also a talented songwriter and record producer. Over the years, he has collaborated with many well-known artists, including Ed Sheeran, P!nk, and Robbie Williams.

His work with Snow Patrol and these artists has earned him recognition in the music industry. McDaid's contributions to songwriting and producing have helped shape the sound of several popular songs and albums. His influence extends beyond his own band, making him a notable figure in modern music.
